notesStmt.note: Yosef ben Yudah called Elhakhim: inscribed with his name in the colophon (see volume 3, Or 2628, folio 185v).
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: The second volume of the Bible, with masorah magna and parva.

collation.p: 34 quires: i-xvi8 (folios 1-128), xvii8-1 (folios 129-135), xviii-xxv8 (folios 136-199), xxvi10 (folios 200-209), xxvii-xxxiv8 (folios 210-273). Catchwords. On guards.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Sefardi square script, partially punctuated, of the 15th century. Shemu᾿el ben Shemu᾿el ibn Musa: inscribed with his name in the colophon, Lisbon, 5243 [1483] (see volume 3, Or 2628, folio 185v).
